scheduleHeader.label: Schedule Events
examples: schedule [surprise party](calendar event) [tomorrow at 4pm](period of time)
schedule [meeting with Jenny](calendar event) [11am for 1 hour](period of time)
schedule [climbing trip](calendar event) on [Personal](calendar) for [Friday](period of time)

createReminderHeader.label: Create Reminders
examples: remind me to [redesign the homepage](reminder title)
remind me to [pick up the dry cleaning](reminder title) on [Wednesday](date and time)
remind me to [call Charles back](reminder title) at [4pm tomorrow](date and time)
